text: indifferent, but I really tremble for my country! I may be mistaken, 1tho' I cannot but fear that the exasperation of the People will be so great at the return of Ultratoryism that the Commons House upon a dissolution, which must be had, will be a mass of Radicalism, & then God knows what may happen...
